submittedAlert: You have submitted your claim to the tribunal
processClaim: We aim to process your claim by
busyPeriod: . In busy periods it may take longer.

acknowledgement.header: The tribunal has acknowledged your claim
acknowledgement.p1: The tribunal has also served a Notice of Claim to the respondent and set a hearing date.
acknowledgement.p2:
What happens next
The tribunal has asked the respondent to respond to your claim by

rejection.header: The tribunal has rejected all or part of your claim
rejection.p1: The tribunal will close your claim.

respondentReceived.header: The tribunal has received a response from the respondent
respondentReceived.p1: We will process the response and contact you soon to tell you what will happen next.

respondentRejection.header: The tribunal has rejected the respondent's response.

respondentAcknowledgement.header: The tribunal has acknowledged the respondent's response.

respondentApplicationReceived.p1TypeB: You do not need to respond to this application.

orderOrRequest.noResponseRequired: The tribunal has sent you a notification
